import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Container, Col, Row, Button, Modal, Alert, Form, } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useState } from "react"; import "./HelpUs.css"; import { FaPen } from "react-icons/fa"; const HelpUs = () => { const [countries, setCountries] = useState([]); const [meals, setMeals] = useState([]); const [mealSelected, setMealSelected] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { fetch(`https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1/list.php?a=list`) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { var countriesData = []; data.meals.map((country) => { countriesData.push(country.strArea); }); setCountries(countriesData); }); }, []); const countrySelect = (country) => { fetch(`https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1/filter.php?a=${country}`) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { console.log(data.meals); const mealsArray = []; data.meals.map((meal) => { mealsArray.push(meal); }); setMeals(mealsArray); }); }; return (
